sense.gloss: needless fear, groundless apprehension, unfounded worry
Chinese matrimony vine (Lycium chinense), Chinese wolfberry, goji
Chinese wolfberry fruit (Lycium chinense), Chinese matrimony vine fruit

sdata.j: ↑元気↑↓げんき↓な↑声↑↓こえ↓がそのまま↑返↑↓かえ↓ってくる。↑杞憂↑↓きゆう↓だったかな・・・。
sdata.e: Her cheerful voice responded just like that. Guess I was worrying over nothing...
